author: zemse
content:
Hi! Recently I have created a PR (https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/3773).
Can any available editors review it please?

author: abcoathup
content: Any suggestions on how to get notified/see when EIP PRs are merged for new draft EIPs?

author: sky.cactus
content: Related to your newsletter I think.

author: poojaranjan
content: This should provide a monthly update of EIPs moving to different statuses - https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/EthereumImprovementProposalsInsight/https%3A%2F%2Fhackmd.io%2F%40poojaranjan%2FEIPsInsightAugust2021

author: poojaranjan
content: The fastest way to get notified is to subscribe to https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pulls but then you'll get notification of all PRs.

author: abcoathup
content: Thanks, that isn't going to meet my needs as I need it weekly, I will keep checking PRs manually
